track_nc.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !  =================================
00002 !
00003 !    Tracking n_c for laser
00004 !
00005 !   $Revision 1.5$
00006 !
00007 !  =================================
00008 
00009 subroutine track_nc
00010 
00011   use physvars
00012 
00013   implicit none
00014   include 'mpif.h'
00015 
00016   real, dimension(0:ngx+1) :: rho1d
00017 
00018   integer :: i, j, k, ng, i1, i2, j1, j2, k1, k2, jfoc, kfoc, icrit
00019   character(30) :: cfile
00020   character(5) :: cme
00021   character(6) :: cdump, cvis
00022   logical :: found
00023   real :: xc1, dx, dy, dz
00024 
00025   integer :: icm, icp, ixc, nover
00026   integer :: ierr
00027 
00028   call densities  ! Compute local ion density rhoi_loc on 3D grid
00029 
00030   ng = (ngx+2)*(ngy+2)*(ngz+2)                         ! total # gridpoints
00031 
00032   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(rhoi_loc, rhoi, ng, MPI_REAL, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00033 
00034   dy = yl/ngy
00035   dz = zl/ngz
00036   dx = xl/ngx
00037 
00038 ! density average line-out along laser axis: 5x5 average, converted to n/nc
00039 
00040   jfoc = max(2.0,focus(2)/dy) ! ensure index>=0
00041   kfoc = max(2.0,focus(3)/dz)
00042   rho1d(0:ngx+1) = 0.
00043   do k=kfoc-2,kfoc+2
00044      do j=jfoc-2,jfoc+2
00045         rho1d(1:ngx) = rho1d(1:ngx)+rhoi(1:ngx,j,k)/25./omega**2  
00046      end do
00047   end do
00048 
00049 
00050   ! Determine position of critical density along laser axis
00051  
00052 ! initial leading edge of plasma
00053   if (target_geometry == 1 .or. target_geometry ==3) then
00054      xc1 = plasma_centre(1)-r_sphere 
00055   else
00056      xc1 = plasma_centre(1)-x_plasma - x_layer(1)  
00057   endif
00058 
00059 ! abort tracking if particle number too low
00060   if (npart_total.le.100) then
00061         write(*,*) 'fixing xcrit at ',xc1
00062      x_crit=xc1
00063      rho_upper=1.0
00064      return
00065   endif
00066 
00067  !  start indice
00068   ixc = xc1/dx
00069   icm = min(max(ixc,1),ngx-1)
00070   icp = icm+1
00071   icrit = icm
00072   found = .false.
00073   rho_track = 1.5   ! tracking density
00074 
00075 !  sweep down
00076   i = icm
00077   do while ( i > 0 .and. .not.found)
00078      if ( rho1d(i)<= rho_track .and. rho1d(i+1)> rho_track ) then
00079         found=.true.
00080         x_crit = i*dx + dx*(1.-rho1d(i))/(rho1d(i+1)-rho1d(i))
00081         icrit=i
00082      endif
00083      i = i-1
00084   end do
00085 
00086 !  sweep up
00087   i = icm
00088   do while ( i < ngx .and. .not.found)
00089      if (rho1d(i)<= rho_track .and. rho1d(i+1)> rho_track) then
00090         found=.true.
00091         x_crit = i*dx + dx*(1.-rho1d(i))/(rho1d(i+1)-rho1d(i))
00092         icrit = i
00093      endif
00094      i = i+1
00095   end do
00096 
00097   if (.not.found .and. itime>0) then 
00098         beam_config=0 ! switch off laser
00099         if (my_rank==0) write(15,*) 'Target burnt through - switching off laser'
00100   endif
00101 
00102   rho_upper=0.
00103   nover = 5./dx
00104 
00105   do i=icrit+1,min(icrit+nover,ngx)
00106      rho_upper = rho_upper + rho1d(i)
00107   end do
00108 
00109   rho_upper = rho_upper/nover  ! ave. upper shelf density
00110 
00111 !  if (.not.found) x_crit=xc1  ! original plasma edge 
00112 !  if (.not.found) x_crit=x_crit + dt  ! vacuum propagation
00113  
00114 if (my_rank==0) then
00115    write(*,'(/a15,f10.3,a15,f10.3,a15,f10.3)') &
00116         'plasma edge: ',xc1, ' x_crit: ',x_crit,' n_upper: ',rho_upper
00117    write(15,*) 'plasma edge: ',xc1, ' x_crit: ',x_crit
00118 
00119 endif
00120 
00121 
00122 end subroutine track_nc
Generated on Tue Jan 23 16:02:50 2007 for PEPC by  1.4.7-20060810
